properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_CD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, COUNT(BOARD_REPLY_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN "LIKE" ON(BOARD_REPLY_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), READ_COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_NM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATE_DT, READ_COUNT, B.MEMBER_NO, COUNT(BOARD_REPLY_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) LEFT JOIN "LIKE" ON(BOARD_NO = BOARD_REPLY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_NM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), READ_COUNT, B.MEMBER_NO
SELECT BOARD_CT_NO, CONTENT, CONTENT_SIZE, CONTENT_LEVEL FROM BOARD_ARTICLE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT IMG_NO, IMG_SIZE, IMG_RENAME, IMG_ORIGINAL, IMG_LEVEL FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" WHERE BOARD_REPLY_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT COUNT(COUNT(*))FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_ARTICLE USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = ? AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE ? OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE ? OR CONTENT LIKE ? OR MEMBER_NM LIKE ?) GROUP BY BOARD_NO

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.*, (SELECT IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE IMG_LEVEL = 0 AND BOARD_IMG.BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO) THUMBNAIL FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, COUNT(BOARD_REPLY_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN "LIKE" ON(BOARD_REPLY_NO = BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD_ARTICLE USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE ? OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE ? OR CONTENT LIKE ? OR MEMBER_NM LIKE ?) GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), READ_COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
